channel.title: Upgrade on PrestaShop Tests
channel.description: Recent content in Upgrade on PrestaShop Tests

item.title: [FO] Upgrade from 1.7.5 to last build and then exploratory test on FO
item.description: [FO] Upgrade from 1.7.5 to last build and then exploratory test on FO Details Component : Core Status : Sandbox Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-1585 Steps Step Description Expected result On a fresh 1.7.5.x install : Add Multistore, Localization Pack, Products (of all types), Discounts, Customers, Carrier, Modules (partner and PS), make some orders. Then upgrade to the build tested. Check everything works fine on Front-Office and no data were lost.
